sentences.sContent: Objective To evaluate the therapeutic efficacy of percutaneous ethanol injection (PEI) under CT guidance to ablate retroperitoneal or intraperitoneal metastatic lymph nodes.
sentences.sContent_eng: Objective To evaluate the therapeutic efficacy of percutaneous ethanol injection (PEI) under CT guidance to ablate retroperitoneal or intraperitoneal metastatic lymph nodes.
sentences.sCn: 目的研究CT引导下经皮穿刺酒精消融疗法对腹膜后或腹腔转移性淋巴结的治疗价值。
